name: Dansebox
description:
Dansebox is a frenetic and fast-paced rythm game where you play as many different polygons avoiding obstacles while listening to music.

Game in its current state contains:

  • 3 different game modes
  • Level Editor
  • Replay saving and view system
  • Custom skins
  • Settings & Accessibility

Music by Pikatoste ❤️

*️⃣ Note: Game does not contain any levels or music included right now. Levels must be downloaded apart. Join our discord to download levels created by the community

⚠️ Warning: This game contains flashing lights and colours that could make certain individuals experience seizures. You can disable this in the game settings. If you have an epileptic condition or any member of your family has had it, consult your physician before playing.

Community
